alert.note: Alert for Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 6:47AM AKST until December 21 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Southern Inner Channels including Ketchikan, Thorne Bay, Kasaan, and Prince of Wales Highways. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Tuesday morning, at the north end of Ketchikan, and at higher elevations. Snow density will be dry to start and accumulate quickly. Some mixing with rain is possible Tuesday afternoon near sea level.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. A warning means that a winter storm is already occurring or imminent. This storm could pose a threat to life and property.
